qas.question: In what month and year did Gaddafi begin Third International Theory?
Who was the founder of Three Worlds Theory?
What sort of state did Gaddafi believe should be founded?
Along with the United States, what country did Gaddafi believe to be imperialist?
What economic philosophy was associated with the West?

context: In <a0_0>June 1973<a0_0/>, Gaddafi created a political ideology as a basis for the Popular Revolution. Third International Theory considered the U.S. and the <a3_0>Soviet Union<a3_0/> as imperialist, thus rejected Western <a4_0>capitalism<a4_0/> as well as Eastern bloc communism's atheism. In this respect it was similar to the Three Worlds Theory developed by China's political leader <a1_0>Mao Zedong<a1_0/>. As part of this theory, Gaddafi praised nationalism as a progressive force and advocated the creation of a <a2_0>pan-Arab<a2_0/> state which would lead the Islamic and Third Worlds against imperialism.
